file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
info:
  title: Example OpenAPI 3 definition.
  version: 1.0.0

paths:
  '/ping/{id}/{test}':
    get:
      summary: example summary
      operationId: getPingTestById
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: test_id
          description: User id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: example description
